Pokémon Legends: Z-A Mega Dimension DLC Debuts Mega Zeraora, Though Unlocking It 'Will Be a Little Difficult' - IGN
tech_news.description: Fan-favorite Pokémon Zeraora will gain a Mega Evolution in the upcoming Pokémon Legends: Z-A Mega Dimension DLC. However, a fresh trailer revealing the creature's design has warned that it may be tough to unlock.

tech_news.title: Huge Ghost of Yotei PS5 Patch Drops Next Week, Adds New Game+, Items, and More - Push Square
Tales of Berseria Remastered announced for Nintendo Switch - Nintendo Everything
tech_news.description: Bandai Namco isn’t slowing down on its Tales of remasters, and has now revealed Tales of Berseria Remastered for Nintendo Switch. It’s coming on February 26, 2026.

tech_news.title: Apple announces finalists for the 2025 App Store Awards - Apple
tech_news.description: Apple announced the finalists for the 2025 App Store Awards, recognizing 45 app and game developers for their achievements in innovation, user experience, and cultural impact.
